comments.body: Welcome to the forum,  I tried to register to the site and upon clicking registration, instead of email the site needs the name of the player, it is somehow a turn-off and frown upon by the crypto community to ask for the name during the registration.  Most casino ask for email, and then the player can then later provide the personal detail if he feels comfortable to the site.Another thing, after registration you are giving out the username to use for login, many users aren't familiar with this kind of registration and might skip or forget this step making them reregister because they forgot to save the given username. I think it is better to let the player register their username or email for login, I have navigated some parts of the hidden page, and I can say, your description is somehow misleading when you are saying that there are thousands of games available when in truth there is only a few.I also wanted to point out the image (icon), they are somehow blurry or pixilated, I think you need to enhance the ICON and use high-resolution images.  I know you are just starting out but I think you can present the site better.
